skills.name: Divine Soulband
skills.description: [SP: 16][CD: 13s] Deploys the weapon, immobilizing enemies within range for 6s and launching 13 light spears. Light spears will drop on random enemies one by one, dealing 282% ATK of Lightning DMG.

skills.name: Witness of Pledge
skills.description: Characters attacks have a 20.0% chance of marking enemies with a Holy Light Brand that lasts for 6s. Marked enemies take another 650 Lightning DMG from every hit taken. Effect can only be triggered once every 13s.

skills.name: Key of Binding
skills.description: In co-op raids, team deals 20.0% bonus Lightning DMG and takes 15.0% less Fire DMG for 10.0s after a weapon skill is used.
